message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this high-value product. I believe you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. Would you be willing to sell it for $10500? I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I'll sell it to you for $11250. This is the lowest I can go, considering its value to me.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $11250 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10750. This is a fair price considering the value you placed on the product yourself.

I understand you're still looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10750. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. I'll sell it to you for $11000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
